replies.bodyText:
Good. But I though it should be to refine in another tasks. The idea is to not be disruptive with the current behavior the main consumers of the logs have now (like Lumino and token bridge). And all this work (the new blooms) are optional, only to be adopted by power users.
Even with 2 millions of blocks, the used memory should be few megabytes.
